groups.name: DOLE Whip® [Available at Patio Bar Only]

items.title: DOLE Whip®
items.description: DOLE Whip® Pineapple Soft Serve, served in a 70th Celebration Cup. Limit Two (2) per person, per transaction. Available While Supplies Last.

items.title: DOLE Whip® Float
items.description: DOLE® Pineapple Juice topped with DOLE Whip® Pineapple Soft Serve, served in a 70th Celebration Cup. Limit Two (2) per person, per transaction. Available While Supplies Last.

groups.name: Alcoholic Beverages [Available at Patio Bar Only]

items.title: DOLE Whip® Float with a splash of Rum
items.description: DOLE Whip® Float with Captain Morgan Parrot Bay Coconut Rum, served with a 70th Celebration Cup on the side. Limit Two (2) per person, per transaction. Available While Supplies Last. No Discounts Apply.
